creator: andrew.r.bredhauer@transport.qld.gov.au
text:
I've got a test plan in which I've disabled a number of http samplers. Now 
when I load the test plan and expand the Thread Group I get a null pointer 
exception (below) and the GUI fails to render correctly from that point 
onwards. I've attached the test plan for debuggin purposes.

Andrew

Sample test file to demonstrate problem
creator: andrew.r.bredhauer@transport.qld.gov.au
sebb@apache.org
text:
Which version of JMeter were you using? And which OS and JVM?
Works OK for me with the latest 2.0 code and with 2.0.1 on Win NT, Java 1.4.2

Please also post the jmeter.log file.

I'm using the nightly build from 20040923.

In the JMeter log i get this

C:\Java_utils\jakarta-jmeter-2_0.20040923\bin>jmeter
